body_html:
I'm running into the same issue today when trying to compile an op:
I need to use "tensorflow/core/util/cuda_kernel_helper.h", which recursively includes "cuda/include/cuda.h", which does not exist.
On my system, cuda is not installed under a directory named exactly "cuda", so I need to hack this by soft links.
Any better solutions?

body:
I'm running into the same issue today when trying to compile an op:
I need to use "tensorflow/core/util/cuda_kernel_helper.h", which recursively includes "cuda/include/cuda.h", which does not exist.
On my system, cuda is not installed under a directory named exactly "cuda", so I need to hack this by soft links.
Any better solutions?
